Likelihoods¶

Note

  • BaseLikelihood is the basic structure of the likelihoods objects.
  • CompositeLikelihood and LikelihoodMultiplier allow to create more complex probabilities from the combination of two or more.

BaseLikelihood¶

This is the base likelihood object. Base for all other likelihoods.

class likelihoods.BaseLikelihood.BaseLikelihood(name)[source]¶
freeParameters()[source]¶

Returns the free parameters of the chosen model.

loglike_wprior()[source]¶
name()[source]¶

Name of the Likelihood Object

setTheory(theory)[source]¶

Set the cosmological theory or other one

theory()[source]¶
theory_loglike_prior()[source]¶
updateParams(params)[source]¶

Updates parameters in each step of sampling
